title: #80 - Bert Kreischer
description: On this episode of The H3 Podcast we are joined by comedian Bert Kreischer! Together we discuss ASMR videos, quicksand porn, Tony Robbins' servants, triathlons, Paul Flart, and of course wiping from the front vs. the back. Bert Kreischer is a comedian and story teller who's new Netflix special "Secret Time" is out now!
itunes:author: Ethan Klein
